author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cyanotech Corp Sees Higher Production Costs
text:
April 13 (Reuters) - Cyanotech Corp:
* UNDERTAKEN RE-INOCULATION OF SPIRULINA PONDS WHICH CO BELIEVE WILL ALLOW TO CORRECT NUTRIENT LEVELS & STABILIZE PRODUCTION
* DURING RE-INOCULATION PROCESS, WHICH CO EXPECTS TO BE COMPLETED BY MID-MAY, CO WILL NOT BE ABLE TO HARVEST ANY NEW SPIRULINA
* CYANOTECH SAYS PRODUCTION COSTS HAVE & WILL INCREASE DURING Q4 OF FISCAL YEAR 2018 & Q1 2019 FISCAL YEAR - SEC FILING Source text ( bit.ly/2H0bKkw ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
